snippet: Under the terms of the deal, Vivint Solar stockholders will receive $16.50 per share in cash, shares and convertible debt.
abstract: DealBook Online; SunEdison and its publicly traded power plant unit TerraForm Power announce deal to acquire Vivint Solar for around $2.2 billion.
lead_paragraph: Under the terms of the deal, Vivint Solar stockholders will receive $16.50 per share in cash, shares and convertible debt.

headline.main: SunEdison to Buy Vivint Solar for About $2.2 Billion
